ComicInfo.Title: Mad’s Celebrity Cause-of-Death Betting Odds; Selecting the Right High School Clique for You; The Lighter Side of...; A Mad Look at Swimming Pools; Mad’s Modern Military Course Catalog; Modern Celebrity Couple Dilemmas; A Mad Peek Behind the Scenes at a Modern Health Spa; Letters to Britney Spears; Alternate Designs for the New $20 Bill; Melvin & Jenkins' Guide to Hospitals; Legitimate Gripes of Your Average Serial Killer; Monroe and… the High Seas Part Two; Gatorator; The Rock Concert
ComicInfo.Summary: A cynical look at justice, reasoning, logic, timing, family planning, relationships, activists, lectures, therapy, corporate thinking, the office, problem solving, and doctors.
